name: Ode to Frogger
description:
An affectionate PC remake of the arcade classic Frogger.

The objective of the game is to reach all five victory ponds without losing all your lives. If that's too easy for you, try the second level. Things are moving a bit faster. Run up the score as high as you can!

Credits:

  • Original game by Konami
  • Ode to Frogger implementation by Patrick Boyer
  • Sprite sheet by loweonline
  • Sound effects by jalastram (http://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-pickup-free-s... and http://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jump-free-sou...)
